name: Rotator
description: A container for rotation information (Pitch, Yaw, Ro). All rotation values are stored in degrees.

properties.name: Pitch
properties.description: Rotation around the right axis (around Y axis), Looking up and down (0=Straight Ahead, +Up, -Down)

properties.name: Yaw
properties.description: Rotation around the up axis (around Z axis), Running in circles 0=East, +North, -South.

properties.name: Roll
properties.description: Rotation around the forward axis (around X axis), Tilting your head, 0=Straight, +Clockwise, -CCW.

functions.name: GetForwardVector
functions.description: Get the forward (X) unit direction vector from this component, in world space.

functions.name: GetRightVector
functions.description: Get the right (Y) unit direction vector from this component, in world space.

functions.name: GetUpVector
functions.description: Get the up (Z) unit direction vector from this component, in world space.

functions.name: RotateVector
functions.description: Rotate a vector rotated by this rotator.

parameters.name: vector
parameters.description: the vector to rotate by the Rotator

functions.name: Normalize
functions.description: In-place normalize, removes all winding and creates the “shortest route” rotation.

functions.name: UnrotateVector
functions.description: Returns the vector rotated by the inverse of this rotator.

parameters.name: vector
parameters.description: The vector to rotate by the inverse of the Rotator

functions.name: IsNearlyZero
functions.description: Checks whether rotator is near to zero within a specified tolerance

return.description: whether the rotator is nearly zero

functions.name: IsZero
functions.description: Checks whether all components of the rotator are exactly zero

return.description: whether the rotator is exactly zero

static_functions.name: Random
static_functions.description: Generates a random rotation, with optional random roll

parameters.name: roll
parameters.description: Whether to use a random roll in the rotator, otherwise uses 0 for roll
